chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the basics of machine learning, types of machine learning, supervised and unsupervised learning, and important terminologies used in machine learning.

subchapters.subchapter_description: An overview of the concept of machine learning.
Understanding the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the basics of coding with Python, including data types, operators, loops, functions, and more.

subchapters.subchapter_description: A brief overview of the different data types in Python and how to work with operators.
How to use conditional statements and loops in Python.
Creating and using functions and modules in Python.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers data preparation techniques, including data cleaning, data transformation, and feature engineering.

subchapters.subchapter_description: Cleaning and prepping data for machine learning.
Transforming data to better fit machine learning models.
Creating new features from existing data.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers supervised learning algorithms, including linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and random forests.

subchapters.subchapter_description: Simple and Multiple Linear Regression.
Binary Logistic Regression and Multiclass Classification.
Classification and Regression Trees.
Ensemble Learning with Random Forests.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers unsupervised learning algorithms, including k-Means clustering, Principal Component Analysis (PCA), and Singular Value Decomposition (SVD).

subchapters.subchapter_description: Building clusters from data.
Dimensionality Reduction.
Matrix Factorization.
Discovering patterns in data.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers deep learning and neural networks, including feedforward networks, convolutional neural networks (CNNs), and recurrent neural networks (RNNs).

subchapters.subchapter_description: Building a basic neural network.
Applying CNNs to image classification.
Applying RNNs to sequential data analysis.
Unsupervised Learning with Autoencoders.
